name: Future Delivery
description:
Play as a drone in the year 2043, when drones are the best way to deliver stuff, but the now the planet is invaded by aliens, so you must destroy them so you can deliver your boxes, get some cash, and with that you can buy upgrades to kill your enemies way easier.

This is my first Game Jam Game.

#Redefine2021 Game jam

If you can't select options on any menu, press the "esc" key
